quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Superman
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, jason, independence. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This trio of talented ladies starred in the 2000 movie Chocolat.

options.text: Kathy Bates, Sharon Stone, Carrie-Anne Moss
Kate Blanchet, Judi Dench, Juliette Binoche
Juliette Binoche, Lena Olin, Judi Dench

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Juliette Binoche, Lena Olin, Judi Dench

questions.question: What is the name of Lex Luthors girlfriend in the film Superman Returns?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kitty

questions.question: This 2006 movie starred Jason Statham, Amy Smart and Efren Ramirez.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crank

questions.question: This 1994 movie starred Tommy Lee Jones, Robert Downey Jr. and Juliette Lewis.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Natural Born Killers

questions.question: In 1982 Julie Andrews, James Garner and Lesley Ann Warren starred in this musical about a female impersonator.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Victor Victoria

questions.question: The 1996 movie Independence Day starred Will Smith, Jeff Goldblum and Bill Paxton.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the 2006 movie Superman Returns, opening titles reveal that Superman has been absent from Earth for five years. Where was he during this period?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Krypton

questions.question: In the movie Superman Returns, Lois Lane is married to Superman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Elizabeth Berkley starred in this movie with Campbell Scott, Jesse Eisenberg and Isabella Rosselini.

options.text: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Roger Dodger

questions.question: Michael Madsen, Uma Thurman, Vivica Fox and Samuel L. Jackson were in Kill Bill and Kill Bill vol. II.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the Movie Superman Returns, how does Lex Luthor plan to defeat Superman and kill billions of people?

options.text: by shooting a Kryponite bullet at Superman
by using one of the stolen Kryptonian crystals

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: by using one of the stolen Kryptonian crystals

questions.question: What year did the version of King Kong that starred Fay Wray, Bruce Cabot and Steve Clemente come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1933

questions.question: The 1999 movie Cleopatra starred Timothy Dalton, Billy Zane and Elizabeth Taylor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is Supermans secret identity, and where does he work?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clark Kent, Daily Planet

questions.question: In the move Superman Returns, what did Lois Lanes fiance Richard enjoy doing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: piloting a seaplane

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Westworld

questions.question: In what movie can the following conversation be heard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Da Vinci Code

questions.question: In this 1993 drama, based on Richard Speights book Desperate Justice, a girl is beaten and raped by the janitor of her school, but he doesnt go to prison because there is no proof that he had committed the crime.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Mothers Revenge

questions.question: What 1975 movie is this conversation from?

options.text: ody: Then why dont we have one more drink and go down and cut that shark open?
ody: I can do anything; Im the chief of police.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaws

questions.question: In what 1939 movie do we hear this?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wizard of Oz

questions.question: This exchange was heard in what 2006 movie?

options.text: ug Carlin: But you can change the course of a river, right?
nny: Yeah, but that river is the Mississippi and were lobbing what amounts to a pebble into it. Thats a very few tiny ripples in a kind of big body of water, dont you think?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deja Vu

questions.question: In 1989 Winona Ryder teamed up with Christian Slater and Jeremy Applegate to star in this movie.

options.text: Dont Tell Mom the Babysitter is dead

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heathers

questions.question: The following quote is from the movie Clockwork Orange.

options.text: ex: There was me, that is Alex, and my three droogs, that is Pete, Georgie, and Dim, and we sat in the Korova Milkbar trying to make up our rassoodocks what to do with the evening. The Korova milkbar sold milk-plus, milk plus vellocet or synthemesc or drencrom, which is what we were drinking. This would sharpen you up and make you ready for a bit of the old ultra-violence.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In this 1992 movie, directed by Charles Robert Carner, two girls take their pretty friend to a creek, where they torture and finally kill her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Killer Among Friends

questions.question: This is part of a conversation held between which two characters in the 2008 movie Tropic Thunder?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alpa Chino and Kirk Lazarus

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Shrek
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, judge. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In this 1998 movie, based on a true story,  young Tina Spangler, portrayed by Kirsten Dunst, discovers she is pregnant. Although being pregnant tears her world apart, it also helps her find a true purpose in life.

options.text: For the Love of My Child: The Anissa Ayala Story

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fifteen and Pregnant

questions.question: He starred with Gary Cooper in Sgt. York as a sympathetic preacher. He played Nash Crawford in a couple of the Over the Hill Gang films in the early 70s. Movie critics have listed him as one of the finest actors in motion picture history.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walter Brennan

questions.question: In real life, he was a prisoner of war in WWII taken at the Battle of the Bulge. On film, he starred with Burt Reynolds and Dolly Parton in The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas. He played the Governor, who sang a little tune called Sidesteppin. Do you remember how he set his hat sideways, then spun his head so the hat would settle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charles Durning

questions.question: This 1992 movie, directed by Michael Ray Rhodes, tells the story of a woman suffering from a manic depressive disorder. As she is unable to take care of her children, they are sent to live with foster parents.

options.text: In the Best Interest of the Child
In the Best Interest of the Children

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the Best Interest of the Children

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: He played a tough judge in the Clint Eastwood flick Hangem High in 1968. He was also the businessman with the store of weapons in Stephen Kings Maximum Overdrive.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pat Hingle

questions.question: Which of these characters in the 2007 film Shrek the Third was voiced by Larry King?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doris the ex/evil stepsister

questions.question: What do we first see Meg and Christine doing in the 2004 movie The Phantom of the Opera?

options.text: Running down the stairs and chalking their ballet shows.
Lighting a candle for Christines father.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Running down the stairs and chalking their ballet shows.

questions.question: This character actor starred with Michael Landon in both Little House on the Prairie and Highway to Heaven. The characters he played were Mr. Edwards and Mark Gordon.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Victor French

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Idle

questions.question: He played Dudley Frank in the 2007 movie, Wild Hogs and Tick Tock in the movie Seabiscuit.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: William H. Macy

questions.question: At the end of Shrek the Third, we see that Shrek becomes a father. How many kids does he have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: He is best known for the role of Capt. Cragen on Law and Order: SVU.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dann Florek

questions.question: This 1997 drama, directed by Jack Bender, focuses on the problems of Suzanne Boxer, an unstable young girl who befriends Heather, as she dreams of having Heathers life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Friends Til the End

questions.question: What film company released the film Shrek the Third?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dreamworks

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, blade. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The movie The Da Vinci Code was featured in the 2005 Cannes Film Festival.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What symbol in the movie The Da Vinci Code  was used in connection to the Holy Grail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chalice

questions.question: In the movie 12 Angry Men, Juror #7 voted guilty so that he could leave early and watch Cleveland play the Yankees. When the not guilty votes became a majority, he switched his vote. Name the actor who portrayed the character.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Warden

questions.question: At the end of the movie The Da Vinci Code, we learn that the true Holy Grail, Mary Magdelene lies beneath what famous museum?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Musee du Louvre - Paris

questions.question: This actor, who won a Tony for Inherit the Wind in 1956, played the racist who was Juror #10 in 12 Angry Men.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ed Begley Sr.

questions.question: Robert Langdon, the main character in the movie The Da Vinci Code helps in the solving of a murder case by using his skills in what profession?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Symbologist

questions.question: Silas the Monk , the loyal servant of the Lord, repeated what phrase in the movie The Da Vinci Code?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I am a ghost

questions.question: The plot of the movie The Da Vinci Code revolves around The Priory of Sion, a European secret society founded in 1099. Which of these people was not  mentioned as a member of that organization?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bezu Fache

questions.question: This actor, who played Juror #4 in the movie 12 Angry Men, also starred as Ev Hillman in the The Tommyknockers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: E. G. Marshall

questions.question: The blade or pyramid is a symbol used heavily throughout the movie The Da Vinci Code. Which of these does it NOT represent ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Royalty

questions.question: Audrey Tautou, famous for her role in Amelie, played Sophie Neveu in the film The Da Vinci Code. Which of the following actresses was originally considered for the role of Sophie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kate Beckinsale

questions.question: Which character is related to the victim murdered in the beginning of the film The Da Vinci Code?

options.text: The victim was not related to anyone.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The victim was not related to anyone.

questions.question: Which actor played the young man who was Juror #5 in the movie 12 Angry Men?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Klugman

questions.question: This actor, whose children are named Jane and Peter, was Juror # 8 in 12 Angry Men.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Fonda

questions.question: In the film 12 Angry men, this actor played Juror #3, an emotionally distraught father whose son hadnt spoken to him in two years.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lee J. Cobb
